title: Coming home

replies.body: Hey there!  Transfers are currently on [cooldown ](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/account-transfers-going-cooldown)as we send out end of season rewards.  Transfers should come back later this month!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=yxbh5yIR,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-09T22:02:08.229+0000)
>
> Hey there!  Transfers are currently on [cooldown ](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/account-transfers-going-cooldown)as we send out end of season rewards.  Transfers should come back later this month!

Will it cost blue essences?{{sticker:sg-zephyr}}
